law.catch_line: An applicant for a license shall pay to the clerk the applicable license fee....

text.section: An applicant for a license shall pay to the clerk the applicable license fee.

In a county other than Baltimore City or Baltimore County, the license fee is:
$15 for a business that employs not more than 10 individuals;
$50 for a business that employs 11 to 20 individuals; and
$100 for a business that employs more than 20 individuals.

In Baltimore City or Baltimore County, the license fee is:
$40 for a business that employs not more than 10 individuals;
$125 for a business that employs 11 to 20 individuals; and
$250 for a business that employs more than 20 individuals.
